name: Watashi ha Joyuu ni Naritai no
storyline: She was aiming to become an actress. But, her hectic days eventually made her lose sight of he reasoning to why. So in this story, she is trying to find her first reason to why she wanted to become an actress to begin with.
summary: This is a short visual novel about a girl who has lost sight of the reason for her dreams to become an actress.
